attributes.action: We want the prime minister to hear our voices.
attributes.additional_details: I want Boris to listen to us and note our cons of why a lockdown isn’t a good idea! Peoples mental health’s are so important and more people are dying from mental health than the virus it’s self! Something needs to be put in place and he needs to listen.
attributes.background: We want Boris to talk to the public about the lockdown and etc and how it’s not a good idea and to put in a different plan that is more suitable for everyone in the UK because putting us in another lockdown isn’t the answer
